Class Block

java.lang.Object
ca.yorku.cmg.cnsim.engine.transaction.TransactionGroup
ca.yorku.cmg.cnsim.bitcoin.Block
All Implemented Interfaces:
ITxContainer, Cloneable
public class Block extends TransactionGroup implements Cloneable
The Block class represents a block in a blockchain. It extends the TransactionGroup class.
Author:
Sotirios Liaskos for the Enterprise Systems Group @ York University

  • Method Details

    • getNextID

      public static int getNextID()

    • validateBlock

      public void validateBlock(TransactionGroup newTransList, long simTime, long sysTime, int nodeID, String eventType, double difficulty, double cycles)
      Updates Block with information pertaining to its validation. Used in response to a validation event.
      Parameters:
      newTransList - The list of Transaction objects that are validated.
      simTime - Simulation time at which the validation event occurred.
      sysTime - Real time at which the validation event occurred.
      nodeID - ID of the Node in which validation took place.
      eventType - Textual description of the type of event (for logging). TODO: link to difficulty explanation.
      difficulty - Difficulty under which validation took place. TODO: check if this is correct.
      cycles - The number of cycles (hashes) expended for the validation.

    • hasParent

      public boolean hasParent()
      Checks if the Block has a parent.
      Returns:
      true if the block has a parent, false otherwise.

      public static void resetCurrID()
